long_description: The Yepp Mini Ahead Threadless Adapter allows you to affix the Yepp Mini front child carrier to your bicycle if you have a 1-1/8 in. steerer and threadless stem. Mounting hardware and instructions included; Yepp Mini front child carrier sold separately. Please note: the adapter is designed for use with bicycles that have a 1-1/8 in. steerer tube diameter and threadless stem with spacers.
short_description: The Yepp Mini Ahead Threadless Adapter allows you to affix the Yepp Mini front child carrier to your bicycle if you have a 1-1/8 in. steerer and threadless stem.
